1. For mild allergy symptoms, such as hay fever or hives, give an over-the-counter (OTC) antihistamine. 

2.For stuffy nose, give an OTC decongestant.
For itchy, watery eyes, use OTC allergy eye drops. 

3.For itchy allergic rash, apply cold compresses and an OTC hydrocortisone cream.
